description:
In the chairman`s office, Ouka finds files documenting Mari`s
crimes... The next day, the Mock Battle Tournament has entered the
second round: Kyoya`s 15th Platoon against Takeru`s 35th. But during
the battle, Yoshimizu, Kyoya`s childhood friend and platoon member,
has strange black thorns burst out of her body! "I`ve come to rescue
you, my sweet Mari-san!" Emerging from the black thorns is the
necromancer, Haunted.
Source: crunchyroll
